title: 192-Grimm: Brave Traveler
itunes:title: 192-Grimm: Brave Traveler
description:
An off-the-wall story from the Grimm Brothers about a young man who knew no fear...and why that was a massive problem for him. The creature is a man who you don't want to high five. Mainly because he has eyeballs on his palms. Also mainly because he'll drink your bones with a straw.
